Posts.Content: Hi everyone, New to this and not sure what I am doing but here goes.I have a close and special relative who has been diagnosed with secondary bone cancer after a 4 year battle with breast cancer.The only thing they have said to me is that they are in stage 2 it is terminal and wont be long, was blubbing too much to ask what this means can any one help, or give me an idea how to talk about it with them.
Posts.Title: secondary bone cancer from breast

Posts.Content: Thankyou so much for your help. Its great to know that its not all gloom and doom. Will let you all know how things are.Once again thanks and bless you all.
